Одна из самых прекрасных игр, в которые довелось поиграть. 
Единственный для меня минус (а для кого-то плюс) - это тир от первого лица.

one of the best game i've ever play
Великолепная игра! 10/10 Рекомендую всем.
thumbs up

На эту игру стоит потратить и время и деньги., в этой игре есть все: почва для размышлений о мире, философия, захватывающий сюжет и конечно же Элизабет. Богатый внутриигровой мир, множество красок, сам факт того что город парит в небесах. У меня просто не слов, да и нет смысла их говорить. Эту игру нужно почувствовать. Кен Левин и Irrational Games, 2k games создали не просто игру, они создали целую вселенную в которой мы( в роли главного героя) примем участие. Это шедевр..... Мне нечего больше сказать, спасибо))))

Už keď som  hrával Bioshock 1 a 2  tak sa mi prostredie bioshocku páčilo, ale keď som si pozrel že vyšiel nový diel bol som úplne bez seba. Len to prostredie ma prekvapilo. Hra sa odohráva vo vzdušnom meste Columbia.  Keď som si túto hru kúpil v zľave tak som od nej veľa neočakával. Keď som si ju však nainštaloval povedal som si: "WOW"
                         Prostredie - prekrásne. 
                         Príbeh - vynikajúci. 
                         Dialógy - výborné.
 Nemám čo k tomu dodať. Asi len toľko, že hre dávam 10 kadíbudiek z desiatich. :D

My brain hurts after playing this game.
So good.
最喜欢的游戏之一，美术风格超级喜欢，战斗节奏也很棒，剧情也非常好（虽然结局不太满意），伊丽莎白我女神~！

In a beautiful, floating city amongst clouds, no one can hear you being chased by a giant FUCKING METAL BIRD and a whole society of religious lunatics in a steampunk styled time travel plot that has one of the best female game characters of the last decade. 10/10 would get hit in the face by Elizabeth again.

So my friend and I finished this game and were very impressed with the storyline and how everything come together. I would recommend this game solely on the fact that in has lovely music to go along with the adventure.
This game is some crazy ass inception type game i was so blown away after i got about halfway through the game... deffinetly worth the time and money.
Having played through this a few more times I actually enjoy the game quiter a bit more now.

개인적으로 바쇽을 너무 재미나게 하여 기대를 많이 하였는데 실망스럽지 않았음. 
하지만 대부분의 FPS가 콘솔로 동시 발매 되면서 PC특유의 FPS적인 맛(난이도 하락, 세이브의 분기화 등등)이 좀 없어진것 같음. 
전투는 예전 시리즈가 더 재미난 듯.. 
하지만 스토리도 꽤 만적 스럽고 엘리자벳은 너무 사랑스러움.

 DLC는 꼭 해보기를 권장.

Oh my god! This game was CRAZY! so much mind fuc#ery! If I could go to another world "nudge nudge" which I didnt play this yet, then I would! I would do almost anything to re-play this game and know nothing about it! The experience this game gave me was crazy! It has made me gone and looked at life and wonder "What is real?! Is this actually happening?"

I really do recommend this game! Like I really recommend it!
best game i have played in a while storywise. and the graphics are amazing aswell ;3
Personally not as good as the original, but still an amaizing game. If you have the money for it either get the game or the Bioshock Triple Pack on sale.

Ce jeu est juste parfait ! Une histoire un peu dure à suivre, mais un paysage et monde fascinant ! Sans parler des personnages principaux : Booker et Elizabeth ! Deux personnages très attachants ! On en apprend de plus en plus sur la vie de Booker au fur et à mesure que l'on avance dans le jeu. Quant à Elizabeth, on sait seulement qu'elle a été enfermée dans une tour toute sa vie. Ce jeu est très amusant et on se plonge vraiment dans l'histoire ! Un jeu que je conseille vivement.
exelent game with nice atmosphere and memorable characters !!!!!
Пройдя эту игру, мне стало жалко негров...
I love you Elizabeth!
AHHHHHHHHHH

Overall a very good game just like it's predecessors.
I won't repeat all the praise this game rightfully gets here, that was covered more than enough.

If there is something that really makes me want to ragequit at least once per gaming session, it's the retarded autosave system: Need to go to university? Dinner is ready? Got an appointment? Messed up or ran into one of Rapture's airlocks (aka death traps) after searching for loot for the last twenty minutes?

Rejoice for your last checkpoint was thirty minutes ago and you can relive all the looting again and again.

I don't get why they switched save systems to be frank. Bioshock players never were window lickers that needed "help" to save their progress.
Maybe they wanted to make fights more challenging and deaths more punishing but it causes so much unwanted pain alongside, especially with those bugged airlocks in Rapture, that in the end it's not worth it at all.
I just wish they had an option to manually save out of combat.

It really kills the game for the rest of day for me each time it happens.

Did only play through one, was a little disappointed that i couldnt grasp the full picture of this amazing piece of art untill the last chapter.

9.8/10

It's not just a game, it's a philosophical experience.

I would recommend playing through the base game before the others so you'll be better able to appreciate it, but make sure to play the others before the DLC for story purposes.
Excellent atmosphere & story.  A fun experience.  Great game to pick when it's on sale.
muito baum sei falar no enredo bem feito e bem planejado

Beautiful game, breathtaking really even for being three years old.   The characters feel real and fleshed out due to talented voice acting and a good script.  A fair bit to do and explore beyond the usual A to B.  Elizabeth is the best companion you could ask for, she's a great support character that you don't have to worry about.  There's not quite as much weapon variety since I haven't found different ammo types but the guns are well designed asthetically and there's enough of them.  The game plays smooth, the link between using plasmids and guns is even stronger than Bioshock 1 and you can run & gun or fight from a distance.  I've noticed little to no issues, no crashes or framerate issues the game is stable.  My only gripe is I'd love to freeroam just a bit more but that's me looking for something to complain about.  Worth a buy all day long.

Очень красивая игра .

I have just finished this game about 10 minutes before this review was made. I must say I REGRET not playing this game when it first came out and only touch the game just now.

People say the game is overrated but this is a game where you must play and finish to understand the beauty of the stroyline. The storyline and the lore is without doubt, imo, the greatest there is. The plot might seem complicated and hard to understand at first but when you continue to play and story is slowly being reveal, you would be stuck wanting to know more. It's like you're waiting for the next episode of a show or a movie just when things about to reach it's peak, you can't stop.

The game's atmosphere really is enjoyable. The music, background and scene fit well in every scenario. Gameplay is unique from other FPS and I quite enjoy it. Some character in the game have me emotional involved. 
This game is a MUST have for every gamer as it is one of the best story telling WITH ACTION GAMEPLAY. The story itself would be on par with Telltales's games but there is more action for you to do. 

If you want to get the game, you'll be playing for the story but the gameplay itself is amazing.
11/10, it's so good I bought Bioshock series pack for all my best friends.

[h1][b]P.S It's not just a game, It's an experience [/b][/h1]

One of the best games I've ever played. Great story, visuals and overal feel.

评分：9.8/10。
优点：
+十分出色的剧情。（足够吸引你把这游戏打通一遍又一遍了。）
+艺术性的场景。（截图截图截图！）
+多功能伊丽莎白。（打着打着没子弹了？"接着布克！"即将恶战了？"伊丽莎白，打开它！"）
+各种各样的战斗组合。（各种武器搭配各种异能，还不够爽？）
+超良心的海葬DLC。（海葬两部曲的剧情都超赞，以及第二部曲的伊丽莎白潜行关设计的超棒！偷窥狂异能太好用了~）
缺点：
-迷路。（初见者在中后期估计要一直N一直N…）
总结：
《BioShock Infinite》出色的剧情和战斗，以及伊丽莎白和布克·德威特一定会吸引你的！（本体通关后还有这么良心的海葬DLC，两部曲一周目可以玩5个小时左右！）
当我该提醒伊丽莎白停止休息并出发的时候，我站在人群中看着她跳舞跳了十分钟。

Stylistically one of the best looking games i've ever played. An incredible story and jaw dropping setting.

This is a Masterpiece.

It's a game that could have been much more, but still remains interesting to play. I liked the effort put into the story writing and in the artistic design. Unfortunately, level design is not as good: the game world feels like it's made by huge big-squared deatmatch arenas made purposely for shooting each other. They're not believable places where people actually live. Gameplay is quite repetitive, but the Vigor mechanics and the colorful enemies are addicting enough to make you want to see the end of it.  
Recommended, yes, but only for those who really like the FPS mechanics.

《生化奇兵：无限》的画面令人赞叹，画质选项也很丰富，可以自由调节。Irrational Games对虚幻引擎3的改造尤其值得表扬，带来了环境光遮蔽、后期处理、动态阴影、高分辨率纹理等多项DX11特效，高端显卡一定不要错过。它们的效果都很突出，能够大大改善画质，而且除了后期处理之外，对性能要求都很亲和。
不过也有遗憾，首先是抗锯齿仅提供了FXAA，也不支持通过驱动面板强行开启MSAA等其它类型。尽管FXAA的效果也不错，而且丝毫不干涉性能，但总是欠缺点什么。
其次是完全没有曲面细分。这东西虽然有时候被滥用，但效果也是毋庸置疑的，这里竟然丝毫没用到，结果就是无论人物、建筑物还是物体边缘都非常粗糙，能看到超大的三角形。
Great

es ist besser als teil 2 kann mich aber nicht entscheiden ob der erste oder dieser teil besser ist

我无法相信我的眼睛，这无与伦比的美景。
我无法相信我的耳朵，这娓娓动听的乐章。
我无法相信我的心灵，这是如此的让人激动与感慨，一切都是那么、那么的完美。

（1）这款艺术品，主题围绕时空，平行空间，带您进入玄幻的时间空间、穿梭在不同的维度，这款游戏可以彻彻底底的说是一款艺术品，也是本人玩过最美的游戏，也是本人唯一称之为艺术品的游戏。
（2）这款游戏的时长主线可达15小时左右，算是比较充裕的游戏，而且剧情饱满，充实，美轮美奂。
（3）强烈建议购买DLC，这才算是完美的体验，不过平行空间确实很美，也会很晕，很奇幻的体验，这绝对是其他游戏你感受不到的。

如果只让我推荐一款游戏，那非她莫属！~

這遊戲投資很大,但是就實際看來,畫面並不多麼出色.這種漫畫風格的藝術表現形式也限制了虛幻引擎的發揮.畫面比不上同期或稍晚的crysis,farcry 4,更比不上戰地系列.當然,這些都是寫實風格.這個不是.

至於劇情嘛,估計喜歡這種風格的人會很喜歡,內容和收集很多.

作為一個大作,這遊戲的武器音效做沒啥質感,感覺很廉價.
Absolutely amazing visuals and decent story. The controls are also great and easy to get the hang of. 10/10 game.

Bootyful. 10/10 would feel again.....
Great, but not as good as the first Bioshock.

画面确实不错，优化很好，但像花草之类的小物件表现得比较差。
剧情方面比较晦涩难懂，有很多游戏时间是在体现其剧情上的。

战斗系统中的魔法感觉比较鸡肋，花样多但不实用。
耗蓝少的技能不如直接用枪打，耗蓝大的用几次就没蓝了。
况且蓝是不能自动恢复的，会让人下意识的控制耗蓝来赢得战斗。

有一个各种破衣漏事业线的妹子跟着的感觉很不错，还各种帮捡垃圾送补给。
我保证，在我10多年的游戏生涯里从来没见过这么给力的队友。

最后冲这画面给个好评。

Its COD with a better story.
7/10 SHotgun is shit.
one of my favorites.

By far the best single player story driven FPS I have ever played. In fact it is my favorite game ever! Period 

Bioshock is and has always have been a heavily based on the story FPS game. The gun mechanics and plasmid mechanics are simple and easy to use (there is a small amount of gun, but no weapons acts the same). Enimies have great variety and the new systems support the game very well. 

Story is the main reason we love this game! Its is epic! The world is based in the late 1800s century in a fictional flying city of Columbia. Were you will later get to know its story and reveal it's sectrets. This is the main area of the game (I may be biased because I love the style of the 1700-1960s). The characters are epic! Elizabeth and Booker are very well done characters and their stories are personalities are perfect and they are represented in a prefect matter. The side characters are also very well done (Lutece twins, Fritzroy and so on). There is no boring moment in this story. 

Also the DLC is also very strong in it's own story and you should really play both of the episodes. 

Get this game and enjoy. 

Final rating 10/10
The best singleplayer game i have ever played in my life!!! It is so emotional and moving that you cant let go of the girl!!
GREATEST GAME EVER!
